name: Sadomasochism
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Gods © 2014, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: While subject to this spell, any time you are dealt damage, your attacker must roll damage for the attack twice and take the higher roll, but the attacker must also succeed at a Will saving throw or become demoralized for 1 round. Each time you deal damage to a creature demoralized by this spell, you roll damage twice and take the higher result.
text_zh: 在这个法术作用在你身上时，任何时候当你受到了伤害，你的伤害制造者就必须投伤害投骰两次取高，但他也必须成功通过一个意志检定，否则被挫败士气（Demoralized）1轮。在此之后，每当你对被这个法术挫败士气的目标造成伤害，你可以在伤害投骰上骰两次取高。
